text: Lu Grimaldi is an brazilian actress. Maria Luisa Tisi (20 June, 1954 in São Paulo) better known as Lu Grimaldi, is a Brazilian actress, known for her work on Apocalipse (2017), Rock Story (2017), for her portrayal of Maria I of Portugal in Liberdade, Liberdade (2016) and Ambitious Women (2015). ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Actresses from São Paulo
title: Lu Grimaldi
